title: Layered chocolate cake
ingredients: ['125g butter', '250g light brown soft sugar', '175g plain flour', '85g cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3 medium eggs', '250ml buttermilk', '250g plain dark chocolate', '125g milk chocolate', '250g butter', '100g icing sugar']
